subject: RE: [junit] Swing Testing
msgSnippet: ... Maybe this will help you: http://www.objectmentor.com/resources/articles/TheHumbleDialogBox.pdf Bernd
messageBody:
> I am new to junit framework. I want to know what
> will be the best way to write test classes for Action
> Listeners of a Swing GUI. I mean how do we to test the
> objects of Action Listener Classes.

Maybe this will help you:
http://www.objectmentor.com/resources/articles/TheHumbleDialogBox.pdf

Bernd

> Regards
> Arvind
